beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where Badlands breaks you. 497 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 100
beats.narration: Mile 100. Gorafe Desert. Lunar badlands terrain at 40°C+. No shade, no water, no mercy. Where the heat begins to break riders.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Desert gravel, alpine passes, technical trails

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 200
beats.narration: Mile 200. Tabernas Desert. Europe's only true desert. Extreme heat, exposed terrain. The psychological middle-ground of suffering.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Desert gravel, alpine passes, technical trails

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 300
beats.narration: Mile 300. Pico Veleta. 3.4 thousandm summit. highest paved road in Europe. From 40°C desert to potential freezing. The signature challenge.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Desert gravel, alpine passes, technical trails

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 400
beats.narration: Mile 400. Final 200km. Cumulative fatigue after 3+ days. Sleep deprivation, heat damage, mechanical wear. Pure survival to the finish.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling Desert gravel, alpine passes, technical trails

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 4 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).
